page.title: 02The New Estate,Llanddulas
page.content: The new estate was started about fifteen years ago,and isn't completed yet.The last house built on the estate was on Craig-y-Don,and the first road to be built was Bron Wern.Our house is at the end of Lon Pendyffryn.There's some waste land nearby on which I play.There are some dormer bungalows on the new estate too. Llanddulas Village Estate lies between the cliff-top chalets and the old village.The streets are steep,as their Welsh names show,e.g.Tan-y-Graig meaning "under the rock",and Pen dyffryn,which is "valley top".However there is a lovely view over the sea towards Colwyn Bay,and Rhyl. The estate was built so that people from Liverpool and Manchester etc. could come and live in Llanddulas,and get jobs in this area.
